Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for accidental disability retirement for deputy sheriffs in Orange county
Summary: Provides for accidental disability retirement for deputy sheriffs in Orange county.
LawCode: Add ยง605-h, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing accidental disability retirement for deputy sheriffs in Orange county
